Twitter - Brendan Gutenschwager (@BGOnTheScene)

Location: United States

Description: Independent reporter on the scene documenting rallies, protests, breaking news & more in the US. Videos available for licensing, DM to inquire

Note: Tweets have been filtered to include only those on/after May 1 2020 (near start of protests/riots)
